markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Burning Mammoth Commando](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1827) **Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 52 **Perception** +15 **Languages** [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15 **Str** +4 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 **Items** [moderate alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75) (3), carved wooden trinket worth 5 gp, _+1 [hatchets](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27)_ (2), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4) --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +17 **Ref** +15 **Will** +13 **HP** 120 **Evasion** When the commando rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.
**Spurred by Death** **Trigger** An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP; **Effect** The commando Interacts to draw a weapon, Steps, Strides, or uses Hunt Prey. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _hatchet_ +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 2d6+8 slashing **Ranged** alchemist's fire +18 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)), **Damage** 2d8 fire damage plus 2 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 2 fire [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage **Ranged** _hatchet_ +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 2d6+8 slashing **Cruel Cutter** Burning Mammoth commandos ably carve flesh and wood with their axes. An axe the commando uses gains the [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) trait and deals an additional 1d6 damage (included in the hatchet Strikes above). **Hunt Prey** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The commando designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're [Tracking](/Actions.aspx?ID=66), as their prey. The commando gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) their prey and to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to Track their prey. The first time the commando hits their designated prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage. The commando also ignores the penalty for making ranged attacks within the second range increment when attacking their prey. These effects last until the commando uses Hunt Prey again.
name: Burning Mammoth Commando

text: Burning Mammoth Commando Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 28 Unspecific Lore : DC 26 Specific Lore : DC 23 Burning Mammoth Commando Source Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra pg. 52 Perception +15 Languages Hallit Skills Acrobatics +15, Athletics +15, Stealth +17, Survival +15 Str +4 Dex +4 Con +2 Int +1 Wis +2 Cha +0 Items moderate alchemist's fire (3), carved wooden trinket worth 5 gp, +1 hatchets (2), Leather Armor --- AC 25 Fort +17 Ref +15 Will +13 HP 120 Evasion When the commando rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead. Spurred by Death Reaction Trigger An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP; Effect The commando Interacts to draw a weapon, Steps, Strides, or uses Hunt Prey. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action hatchet +18 (Agile, Magical, Reach, Sweep), Damage 2d6+8 slashing Ranged Single Action alchemist's fire +18 (range increment 30 feet, Splash), Damage 2d8 fire damage plus 2 persistent fire damage and 2 fire splash damage Ranged Single Action hatchet +18 (Agile, Magical, Sweep, thrown 10 feet), Damage 2d6+8 slashing Cruel Cutter Burning Mammoth commandos ably carve flesh and wood with their axes. An axe the commando uses gains the reach trait and deals an additional 1d6 damage (included in the hatchet Strikes above). Hunt Prey Single Action (Concentrate) The commando designates a single creature they can see and hear, or one they're Tracking, as their prey. The commando gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek their prey and to Survival checks to Track their prey. The first time the commando hits their designated prey in a round, they deal an additional 1d8 precision damage. The commando also ignores the penalty for making ranged attacks within the second range increment when attacking their prey. These effects last until the commando uses Hunt Prey again.
